query:
CREATE TABLE advancedAnalysis (
  id VARCHAR(64) PRIMARY KEY,
  readingId VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL,
  executiveSummary TEXT,
  detailedAnalysis TEXT,
  stunningInsights TEXT,
  moleAnalysis TEXT,
  compatibilityAnalysis TEXT,
  decadeTimeline TEXT,
  pdfPath VARCHAR(512),
  generatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4PQbAAV1fA3eoWB.fdce1f6ecee0 --database kXt5Pe9fvJxeXguVEaNamo --execute CREATE TABLE advancedAnalysis (
  id VARCHAR(64) PRIMARY KEY,
  readingId VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL,
  executiveSummary TEXT,
  detailedAnalysis TEXT,
  stunningInsights TEXT,
  moleAnalysis TEXT,
  compatibilityAnalysis TEXT,
  decadeTimeline TEXT,
  pdfPath VARCHAR(512),
  generatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
